messages.message:
I don’t have much experience with the new ppy+Crafting sandboxes, but can you confirm the following:
1. The commands you’re running to compile + restart your services, and also to view the logs.
2. If this issue persists when resyncing the template (see screenshot)
3. If `/home/owner/instabase/shared-utils/build-utils/shared/env-local-secrets.json` still has your new AWS secrets after restarting your services.
You can put a custom secret in env-local-overrides.json. env-local-secrets.json is managed automatically by the sandbox; don’t put it in there.
